2021 Street Preservation Work Wraps Up

This year, City street crews improved 74.5 lane miles of roads in Bend. With the City’s ‘keep good roads good’ philosophy, work focused on using the right treatment at the right time to provide the most cost-effective way to maintain public roads. 
Post Date: 08/31/2021 12:00 PM 
2021 Street Preservation Work Wraps Up

 

This year, City street crews improved 74.5 lane miles of roads in Bend. With the City’s ‘keep good roads good’ philosophy, work focused on using the right treatment at the right time to provide the most cost-effective way to maintain public roads. This included slurry seal, chip seal and paving projects as well as rebuilding the roundabout at Skyliners Road and Mount Washington Drive.

This season, the City utilized a new innovative treatment called rubberized chip seal, which is a durable pavement that uses recycled scrap tire materials. It was used on about 14 lane miles of residential roads in northeast Bend, keeping approximately 3,600 tires out of the landfill. 

You can find a video of crews putting down the rubberized chip seal at: https://youtu.be/_4RaQxHR_gs [ https://nam11.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?data=04%7C01%7Caaurand%40bendoregon.gov%7C5669f3da5623472e4e5808d96bd3f908%7C1c15334815ef4708aebf1e25e57dc400%7C0%7C0%7C637659380462869518%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&medium=email&reserved=0&sdata=agqk5GlCKGf75fDKwzFs9Qun34U8gBNxx5Vt%2FI8LoGA%3D&source=govdelivery&url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2F_4RaQxHR_gs%3Fmedium%3Demail%26source%3Dgovdelivery ] 

To learn more about Bend’s street preservation practices visit bendoregon.gov/streetpreservation [ https://www.bendoregon.gov/?medium=email&navid=1135&source=govdelivery ].

 

 Wheelchair

Accommodation Information for People with Disabilities

To obtain this information in an alternate format such as Braille, large print, electronic formats, etc. please contact Anne Aurand at aaurand@bendoregon.gov or 541-388-5573; Relay Users Dial 7-1-1

Click here for more information [ https://www.bendoregon.gov/Home/Components/News/News/4729/?medium=email&source=govdelivery ]

Joint City - County Meeting to Discuss Homelessness Solutions

Those interested in hearing more about what Bend City Councilors and Deschutes County Commissioners are working on in relation to addressing homelessness can tune in and listen to a joint meeting of the two elected bodies at 1 p.m. on Thursday, Sept. 2.
Post Date: 08/31/2021 2:16 PM 
 Joint City - County Meeting to Discuss Homelessness Solutions 

  

Those interested in hearing more about what Bend City Councilors and Deschutes County Commissioners are working on in relation to addressing homelessness can tune in and listen to a joint meeting of the two elected bodies at 1 p.m. on Thursday, Sept. 2. 

 

The City and County aim to work together on strategies needed to address housing and homelessness, and the agenda includes updates on existing joint projects as well as upcoming projects and programs. 

 

Deschutes County is hosting this virtual meeting. Find meeting information and agenda at: *www.deschutes.org/meetings* [ https://nam11.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?data=04%7C01%7Caaurand%40bendoregon.gov%7C37348b56afbb40aa761c08d96cc06e15%7C1c15334815ef4708aebf1e25e57dc400%7C0%7C0%7C637660396056402910%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&medium=email&reserved=0&sdata=Chr0bJ0XnB%2BaaDIym8Fb0Lg0hu%2Bj1XOvuDhOIhboA9k%3D&source=govdelivery&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.deschutes.org%2Fmeetings%3Fmedium%3Demail%26source%3Dgovdelivery ]

 

To join the Joint Meeting between Board of County Commissioners and Bend City Councilors

    Please click this URL to join. https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86883628825?pwd=Tkh4ankyelNDT2ZwTG11bWI1anJOUT09 [ https://nam11.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?data=04%7C01%7Caaurand%40bendoregon.gov%7C37348b56afbb40aa761c08d96cc06e15%7C1c15334815ef4708aebf1e25e57dc400%7C0%7C0%7C637660396056402910%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&medium=email&reserved=0&sdata=gYIsZmdg8tdae3hXH1R2h6J4DQbRTS56DNlpmwftzlw%3D&source=govdelivery&url=https%3A%2F%2Fus02web.zoom.us%2Fj%2F86883628825%3Fmedium%3Demail%26pwd%3DTkh4ankyelNDT2ZwTG11bWI1anJOUT09%26source%3Dgovdelivery ]

    Passcode: 893642

 

Or One tap mobile:

    +16699006833,,86883628825# US (San Jose)

 

Or join by phone:      Dial:

        US: +1 669 900 6833      Webinar ID: 868 8362 8825
